mutants.mutated_line: if words == None and any((word is None for word in words)):

mutants.original_line: if words == None or any(word is None for word in words):
mutants.mutated_line: if words != None or any((word is None for word in words)):

mutants.original_line: if words == None or any(word is None for word in words):
mutants.mutated_line: if words == None or any((word is not None for word in words)):

mutants.original_line: return sorted([word for word in words if criterion(word)], key = lambda x: (len(x), x), reverse = True)
mutants.mutated_line: return sorted([word for word in words if criterion(word)], key=lambda x: (len(x), x), reverse=False)
